title: Band Of Mercenaries
opening: The secrets of her past revealed in the words of two Knights of Lycia. Now, to meet her grandfather, Lyn heads west, to Lycia, and to her destiny. A mountain range separates the Sacae Plains from Bern. There are many bandits lurking here, the cruelest of which are the Taliver. They wreak havoc on both Sacae and Bern, and their savagery knows no bounds. On her tenth day away from the plains, Lyn witnesses their atrocities herself.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: This place... It's...

intro.speaker: Sain
intro.line: The entire area is in ruins. Why doesn't their marquess do anything to help?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Taliver Mountain is home to a gang of vicious, ruthless bandits. No marquess holds power here. My village was near here, on the other side of the mountain. My people were... The Taliver bandits came at night. It took only one night. The survivors numbered less than ten, including me. They're soulless beasts. I will never forgive them. Never.

intro.speaker: Sain
intro.line: Lyndis...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: I am not running away. I will be back...someday. I'll be stronger... I will break their swords beneath me like twigs beneath a stallion's hooves. I will avenge my people. I'll do everything in my power.

intro.speaker: Sain
intro.line: When the time comes, bring me with you.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Sain.

intro.speaker: Kent
intro.line: Don't forget me, either.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Kent...Oh! You, too, Tactician? I... You're... Thank you.

intro.speaker: Migal
intro.line: Wait right there, little lady! What are you going to do to apologize? Huh?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Uh...I...That is, I...

intro.speaker: Brigand
intro.line: Hey, she's quite a catch, eh, buddy? I bet the boss'd give us a pretty penny for her.

intro.speaker: Migal
intro.line: Yeah. She roughed me up a bit, so I figure fair's fair. It's no more'n she deserves.

intro.speaker: Brigand
intro.line: What are we gonna do with her flying mule?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Don't you dare touch her!

intro.speaker: Brigand
intro.line: What? You just watch your mouth, girlie!

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Do what you will with me, just... Let her go. Please, I beg of you.

intro.speaker: Migal
intro.line: Ha ha ha! Silly twit! Pegasi can only be found in Ilia. They're rare beasts, worth far more than you by far! We can sell it for a mountain of gold. Let it go? HA!

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: No, you can't...

intro.speaker: Migal
intro.line: C'mon! Let's move!

intro.speaker: Kent
intro.line: What's this? Be on your guard, Lyndis. There seems to be some sort of commotion over there.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: That's... That's a pegasus. Could it be?

intro.speaker: Lyn (Far Off)
intro.line: Florina?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Is that you, Florina?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Ah! Lyn?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Florina! What are you doing in a place such as this?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Lyn! Is it really you? I... I...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Come now, no crying!

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: I'm sorry.

intro.speaker: Kent
intro.line: You are acquaintances?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: She's my friend. This is Florina, a pegasus knight in training from Ilia. She's a little uncomfortable around men. Tell me, Florina, what happened here?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Well...um... When I heard that you had left... I decided to follow you. Then I saw this village. I flew down to ask if they had news of you. I didn't see those two, and...well...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Did your pegasus land on them?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Well, I... A little...

intro.speaker: Brigand
intro.line: Aha! You heard her! She admits her fault! She stepped on my friend, and now she's got to pay!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Did you apologize, Florina?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Yes. I told them I was sorry many times over. They just wouldn't listen. ...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Don't cry, it's alright.

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Lyn...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Listen, she's obviously sorry. Can't we just let this pass? You don't appear to be injured or anything.

intro.speaker: Migal
intro.line: No chance. The girl goes with us—by force if need be!

intro.speaker: Migal
intro.line: Hey! C'mon out now, boys! The men are fair game, but don't put a scratch on the girls!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Tactician! We've got to fight back!

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: Lyn... I...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: You're a pegasus knight, aren't you? You can fight, can't you?

intro.speaker: Florina
intro.line: ...Yes!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Listen carefully, Tactician. We're facing bandits. They're underlings, but we can't take them too lightly. Let's clear them out of here. Are you ready?

battle.speaker: Tutorial
battle.line: Weapons have the strength to be used only a limited number of times. As you fight, their endurance drops. At zero, the weapon breaks and disappears from your inventory. Check your weapon endurance by placing the cursor on a unit and pressing the R Button. You can also check on the item screen. The number next to the weapon is its endurance. Be careful. Without a weapon a unit cannot enter combat.

recruit-visit.speaker: Other Villager
recruit-visit.line: Go away! Go away! We've no more gold for you!

recruit-visit.speaker: Lyn
recruit-visit.line: No, wait! Please! We're not bandits! We want to help the village. Please listen!
Remain inside, everyone. I'll go see what's happening.

recruit-visit.speaker: Wil
recruit-visit.line: Not bandits, huh? So, who are you?

recruit-visit.speaker: Lyn
recruit-visit.line: My name is Lyn. My colleagues and I are just traveling through here. We saw some bandits about. We're going to deal with them, but... We need you to go and warn the villagers.

recruit-visit.speaker: Wil
recruit-visit.line: Hey! Wait! The name's Wil. I'm a traveler of sorts, too. Listen, these villagers have been kind to me. Mind if I fight with you?

recruit-visit.speaker: Lyn
recruit-visit.line: Not at all. We need all the help we can get! Welcome aboard, Wil!

recruit-visit.speaker: Tutorial
recruit-visit.line: By visiting a village, we gained a new companion. Wil is an archer. He uses a bow to fight. Bows can be fired at foes more than 1 space away. Obstacles won't affect your line of fire. Attacking enemies without moving next to them is called indirect combat. If the enemy has no weapons capable of indirect combat, there's no fear of counterattack, and that's to our benefit. However, you cannot fire on adjacent spaces. If someone moves next to you and attacks, that's it. Units with bows are best suited to lend assistance from the rear. Let's try some indirect combat, shall we? Select Wil.

visit.speaker: Girl
visit.line: You came to help the village? That's good. With so many bandits, I wasn't sure what to do. It's not much, but please, take this money. There is an armory to the southeast of us. Equip yourself as you see fit, and help us, please.

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: Draw your swords! We're not listening to any of your stinking apologies!

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: Ugh... You'll live to regret this... My brothers... The Ganelon bandits will not let this stand...

boss.speaker: Lyn
boss.line: Hey, listen! There's something I wanted to ask you.

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: Begging for your life so soon, wench?

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: Taliver? Those greedy monsters? We're nothing like them!! Those fiends will even kill women and children! We're from Ganelon, and we know a little something of honor. We don't harm women, for one thing. Heh heh heh. After all, why kill what you can sell?

boss.speaker: Lyn
boss.line: If you're not Taliver, then there's no reason for you to die here today. If you would like to tuck your tails and flee, do so now.

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: You... You... No more courtesies! You're going to learn to watch your tongue!!!

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: Uh? It's you! So, you changed your mind about joining us, eh?

boss.speaker: Florina
boss.line: Well...no... But...this really is...my fault... Really... So, can we...

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: What?! C'mon, lass, out with it!

boss.speaker: Florina
boss.line: I'm sorry. Can we... Can we just stop fighting now?

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: You've got to be kidding. After I've been made to look like a fool? No way!

boss.speaker: Migal
boss.line: You're coming with us! I promise you that!! Now, if you don't want to get hurt, give yourself up!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: That's finally taken care of.

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: Lyn!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Florina... Why did you follow me? It's so dangerous.

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: Do you remember the knighting ceremony of the Pegasus Knights of Ilia?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Yes, you join a band of freelance soldiers to further your training. Is that what brought you here, Florina?

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: Uh-huh. I wanted to talk to you before I set out. But when I went to Sacae, I heard you had left with some strangers, and...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: You were worried for me? Thank you, but I'm more worried about you.

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: Me?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Listen, most mercenaries are men, right? Bands of men? I can't imagine you being at all comfortable around them.

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: I know, I know. It's just... I've always dreamt of being a pegasus knight. I imagined I would just...work it out. Somehow. After today, I'm not so sure. Maybe I should just...give up...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Florina, don't cry...

end.speaker: Sain
end.line: Yes, there's no reason to give up your dream!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Hm?

end.speaker: Sain
end.line: Lovely Florina! I have the most brillant idea!

end.speaker: Kent
end.line: Sain!

end.speaker: Sain
end.line: You should come with us! With the addition of Wil here, we're a fine group of soldiers, and freelance to boot!

end.speaker: Wil
end.line: Wait, did you just include me?

end.speaker: Sain
end.line: Of course! We were destined to meet here! It's fate! Come now, Lyndis's band of mercenaries is as good a training group as you'll find anywhere!

end.speaker: Kent
end.line: Sain... This is no joking matter!

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: Lyndis? Um, Lyn? Mercenaries?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: I can give you details later. This is all a bit rushed. However, Sain is right. Will you come with us, Florina?

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: Travel with you, Lyn? Truly? I would be so...so happy!

end.speaker: Sain
end.line: Fantastic! Beauteous Florina! I am a knight of Caelin. My name is Sain...

end.speaker: Florina
end.line: Eeek! Stay back! Don't get so close.

end.speaker: Sain
end.line: Ah... Beautiful, and yet so modest!

end.speaker: Kent
end.line: I beg your forgiveness. Calling us mercenaries...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: No, I approve. We can't leave Florina on her own. She requires special attention though. Can I count on you?

end.speaker: Kent
end.line: Yes! You have but to ask.

end.speaker: Wil
end.line: So... Is it really all right if I travel with you?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Oh, yes. Of course! If you're willing, Wil.

end.speaker: Wil
end.line: Actually, I'm very grateful. Truth be told, all of my money was stolen, and I'm...at a bit of a crossroads. I would be honored to count myself one of Lyndis's Legion!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: "Lyndis's Legion"? This is getting stranger with every day, Tactician.
